CustomField.description: The address in the FF record does not match the address we hold on file.
CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Person_Account__c)), Person_Account__r.Account_record_type_mimic__c = "Person Account", OR( Person_Account__r.ShippingPostalCode <> Address_Post_Code__c, Person_Account__r.ShippingStreet <> Address_Street_Address__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The address in the FF record does not match the address we hold on file.
CustomField.label: Different Address
